metadata.creator: Philippine Government
metadata.description: This document is a 1952 annual report of Philippine Oil Development Company under the administration of Pres. Elpidio Quirino. It includes report on drilling operations such as report of Mr. E. F. Richards, President of Kern Drilling Corporation, Mr. Benjamin Daleon, his report on the Panay operation, report from the Petroleum Technologists Inc. regarding the analysis performed on three of the core samples from hole in Panay.
metadata.subject: Annual Report
metadata.title: PHILIPPINE OIL DEVELOPMENT COMPANY ANNUAL REPORT 1952
